pt.title: dietistas
pt.prompt: As a dietitian, I would like to design a vegetarian recipe for 2 people that has approximate 500 calories per serving and has a low glycemic index. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Portuguese. Can you please provide a suggestion?.
pt.description: Como dietista, gostaria de conceber uma receita vegetariana com [requisitos] para [assunto]. Poderiam dar-me uma sugest√£o?
